Seating

Classic Bistro Chair

Timeless and durable, our classic bistro chair features a sturdy metal frame with a comfortable wooden, seat, perfect for creating an inviting atmosphere in any cafe or restaurant.

Technical Specifications:

Metal frame with wooden seat. Dimensions: 18' W x 20' D x 32' H.
